ygData.msgSnippet: sorry...missed the last part of that....i have no idea about the pvp looting thing...and as for making an item lore, it can either be a quest item or a rare

sorry...missed the last part of that....i have no idea about the pvp looting
thing...and as for making an item lore, it can either be a quest item or a rare
drop item or something like that

(\/)ystix Spellchaser
lv 48 human cleric of The Rathe
